mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project (name, owner_login, repo_url, stars, forks, issues, created_at, updated_at, importance_score,description,total_commits,project_code) VALUES (#{name}, #{ownerLogin}, #{repoUrl}, #{stars}, #{forks}, #{issues}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{importanceScore},#{description},#{totalCommits},#{projectCode});
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM project WHERE repo_url = #{repoUrl}
